description: Christian Wilde is back, and he's brought his new buddy, 23 year old Shane Erickson, along for the fun.These two tall, slim studs are all about the cock sucking for this scene. Christian wakes up from a great night of sleep, strolls into the bathroom for a shower, and stumbles upon Shane already washing himself. Since they're friends, there's no reason to have to wait while Shane uses all the hot water, so Christian joins him for some warm, wet fun.Enjoy!
title: Christian Wilde & Shane Erickson
